project.name: Name of the project
project.footprint_width: The numerical width of the footprint for the file. This will never change will be used to calculate the foot print 'center' for each isopiece

isopiece.name: name of the piece
isopiece.id: some numerical value. It should increment over time and should NEVER skip a number

isoanim.startx: the x-loc of the starting frame
isoanim.starty: the y-loc of the starting frame
